long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The BrainX  Pixel Helper is a troubleshooting tool that helps you validate your pixel implementation.

The BrainX  Pixel Helper works in the background to look for conversion or pixels and provide realtime feedback on the implementation. A small number will appear on the BrainX Pixel Helper icon to indicate number of pixel events. When clicked, a panel will expand to show a detailed overview of the page's pixels.
